attributes.action: stop the right of MP's to vote on their own pay awards. MP's pay award to be made in line with the lowest awarded to public servants.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
No other organisation can vote on its own pay rise, so why are MP's aloud to award themselves what they like?
Their pay award should be in line with the lowest awarded to public servants such as nurses, policemen, teachers & be lower than inflation, fixed for 3 years.
